data.name: Use NVIDIA Highlights in Spark to automatically record clips of all your noteworthy moments.
data.value: Use NVIDIA Highlights in Spark to automatically record clips of all your noteworthy moments.

data.name: Log into Spark with Discord to enable features like uploading stats to metrics.ignitevr.gg and TTS.
data.value: Log into Spark with Discord to enable features like uploading stats to metrics.ignitevr.gg and TTS.

data.name: Enable TTS in Spark for events like exact throw speed, joust times, player leave events, and more.
data.value: Enable TTS in Spark for events like exact throw speed, joust times, player leave events, and more.

data.name: You can create a private match in any region you want using the 'Choose Server Region' button in Spark.
data.value: You can create a private match in any region you want using the 'Choose Server Region' button in Spark.

data.name: Use the EchoVR Speaker System to make any audio on your PC sound like an arena.
data.value: Use the EchoVR Speaker System to make any audio on your PC sound like an arena.

data.name: .echoreplay files can be used to play back and analyze matches in the Replay Viewer.
data.value: .echoreplay files can be used to play back and analyze matches in the Replay Viewer.

data.name: Spark is available in both English and Japanese!
data.value: Spark is available in both English and Japanese!

data.name: The server location provided by Spark is not 100% reliable as it is based on the IP address of the server.
data.value: The server location provided by Spark is not 100% reliable as it is based on the IP address of the server.

data.name: Spark's OBS integration allows you to make replay buffer clips and automatically change scenes.
data.value: Spark's OBS integration allows you to make replay buffer clips and automatically change scenes.

data.name: You can change many of Echo VR's ingame settings from within Spark's settings.
data.value: You can change many of Echo VR's ingame settings from within Spark's settings.

data.name: Spark offers Discord Rich Presence and game invites.
data.value: Spark offers Discord Rich Presence and game invites.

data.name: Send someone a spark:// link to let them join your game without an invite.
data.value: Send someone a spark:// link to let them join your game without an invite.

data.name: You can sort the joust times in Spark's dashboard by fastest time as well as by most recent.
data.value: You can sort the joust times in Spark's dashboard by fastest time as well as by most recent.

data.name: Use the server score provided by Spark to choose a server that is fair for both teams.
data.value: Use the server score provided by Spark to choose a server that is fair for both teams.

data.name: You can automatically upload your tablet stats and view them on metrics.ignitevr.gg.
data.value: You can automatically upload your tablet stats and view them on metrics.ignitevr.gg.

data.name: Ignite Playercards show you bars for your stats with your percentile compared to other players.
data.value: Ignite Playercards show you bars for your stats with your percentile compared to other players.

data.name: CV1 is the most comfortable headset by far.
data.value: CV1 is the most comfortable headset by far.

data.name: Ban pitch and roll mid-game
data.value: Ban pitch and roll mid-game

data.name: You can use the event logs in Spark to see exactly when players joined or left in every match.
data.value: You can use the event logs in Spark to see exactly when players joined or left in every match.

data.name: Spark makes sure you never forget the scores in league matches.
data.value: Spark makes sure you never forget the scores in league matches.

data.name: League casters love it when you send them a spark:// link instead of an invite.
data.value: League casters love it when you send them a spark:// link instead of an invite.

data.name: You can set Spark up to save clips when you say 'Clip that!'
data.value: You can set Spark up to save clips when you say 'Clip that!'

data.name: The Replay Viewer is pretty cool. Check it out.

data.name: echopedia.gg has an interactive block callout map. Vote on your preferred block names!
data.value: echopedia.gg has an interactive block callout map. Vote on your preferred block names!

data.name: Spark can automatically clip your goals or saves using Medal.tv integration.
data.value: Spark can automatically clip your goals or saves using Medal.tv integration.
